verses.verse: And he <S%H7200>showed<s%> me <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H5975>standing<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and <S%H7854>Satan<s%> <S%H5975>standing<s%> at his right <S%H3225>hand<s%> to resist <S%H7853>him<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7854>Satan<s%>, The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1605>rebuke<s%> <S%H7854>you<s%>, O Satan; even the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> that has <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H1605>rebuke<s%> <S%H181>you<s%>: is not this a brand <S%H5337>plucked<s%> out of the <S%H784>fire<s%>?

And he <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>spoke<s%> unto those that <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H559>him<s%>, saying, Take <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H6674>filthy<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> from <S%H559>him<s%>. And unto him he said, <S%H7200>Behold<s%>, I have caused your <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> from <S%H3847>you<s%>, and I will clothe you with change of <S%H4254>clothes<s%>.

And I <S%H559>said<s%>, Let them <S%H7760>set<s%> a <S%H2889>fair<s%> <S%H6797>turban<s%> upon his <S%H7218>head<s%>. So they <S%H7760>set<s%> a <S%H2889>fair<s%> <S%H6797>turban<s%> upon his <S%H7218>head<s%>, and <S%H3847>clothed<s%> him with <S%H899>garments<s%>. And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> stood <S%H5975>by<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>; If you will <S%H3212>walk<s%> in my <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and if you will <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4931>charge<s%>, then you shall also <S%H1777>judge<s%> my <S%H1004>house<s%>, and shall also <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H2691>courts<s%>, and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you places to <S%H4108>walk<s%> among these that stand <S%H5975>by<s%>.

<S%H8085>Hear<s%> <S%H3091>now<s%>, O Joshua the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%>, <S%H7453>you<s%>, and your fellows that <S%H3427>sit<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H582>you<s%>: for they are men wondered <S%H4159>at<s%>: <S%H935>for<s%>, behold, I will bring forth my <S%H5650>servant<s%> the <S%H6780>BRANCH<s%>.

For behold the <S%H68>stone<s%> that I have <S%H5414>laid<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>; upon <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> shall be <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H5869>eyes<s%>: <S%H6605>behold<s%>, I will engrave the <S%H6603>engraving<s%> <S%H5002>there<s%>, says the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, and I will <S%H4185>remove<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of that <S%H776>land<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>.

In that <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, shall you <S%H7121>call<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> under the <S%H1612>vine<s%> and under the fig <S%H8384>tree<s%>.
